transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan, kaun?
Executive: Ye Sidharth Enterprises se baat kar rahe hain, Sidharth ji?
Customer: Haan, bol raha hu.
Executive: Sir, Vijay Aggarwal baat kar raha hu, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu sir main.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ye subah aapki account manager Tannu ji se baat hui thi sir aapki.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur aapne ye jo WhatsApp pe aapke paas feedback gaya hoga, aapne not satisfied karke aapne waha tak ye bheja sir.
Customer: Haan barabar hai.
Executive: To bas ussi cheez ko maine janne ke liye call kiya tha ki sir kya issue aap face kar yes yes yes correct correct.
Customer: Four months se maine use karna chalu kiya hai.
Aur abhi tak aise koi concrete conversion nahi hua hai.
Maine unko ye bar bar ye ek do cheez bola hai maine unko.
Aur jo leads bhi mujhe aate hain, uska quantity ka kuch itna jo hum actually wholeselling mein kaam karte hain, hamara actually traditional nahi hai, to kam zyada hota hai ye online se.
Jo ki bada amount rehta hai.
Aur bina jaane pehchane to koi usme itna kaam nahi karta nahi hai haan.
Aur ek do kilo ka nahi hamara order rehta hai, hamara kam se kam 10,000 kilo, 10 ton matlab gaadi to gaadi rehta hai. To 4 to 5 lakh ka bill hota hai uska.
To uske liye aisa koi bhi pan India aise kabhi kaam nahi ho sakta hai. Fir bhi humne koshish hum kar rahe hain usme. To jo leads aate hain maine pehle ek baar unko ye batayi ki jo leads aate hain usme quantity hai mujhe sirf 10 ton ke upar wala hi do aap, uske niche wala show hi mat karo. Ye maine bar bar bola hai baat to us pe kuch workout nahi hota hai.
Aur bolte ki nahi aate hain par aisa nahi par matlab agar 20 aaye to usme se 15 mere kaam ke nahi rahenge, five kaam ke rahenge.
Executive: Sir, main aapko ek bahut achcha option batata hu main aapko, theek hai?
Customer: Haan aur suniye na aur dusri baat unhone fir unhone mujhe last week bhi call kiya tha to maine kaha ki aap aage ek baar baat karte hain. To aaj fir maine aaj unka call aaya tha to unhone seedha mujhe wo apna selling chalu kiya kuch aur kuch plan hai secured aur unhone reason aisa diya ki pehle humne ye nahi bataya kyunki pehle aap initially aap itna kharcha nahi kar sakte ho. To wo baat mujhe samajh mein aayi par ye koi baat nahi banta hai actually maine jo fee bhari hai to uska to mujhe kuch output abhi to at moment to kuch mil nahi raha hai aur upar se aap mujhe fir se bol rahe ho ki aap 20-25 hazar aur kharcha karo to aapko aur benefit denge hum surety dete hain aisa karte hain waisa karte hain. To maine unse kuch baat nahi ki maine sirf haan mein haan milaya unko aur maine call close kar diya. Jab unka wo feedback ka mujhe message aaya to fir maine us pe kar diya maine unko ye baat bhi boli hai ki agar is saal at least ek bhi lead close nahi hui na, convert nahi hui na to main agle saal aapki membership nahi lunga. Ye main seedhe upfront bolta hu aapko.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Main sir jo aapka concern hai bulk order wala sir, correct?
Executive: Abhi jaise ki main aap hi ke portal pe hu sir abhi. To yaha pe abhi main dekh raha hu plain brown craft paper roll ka 15 ghante pehle 5 ton ka requirement aaya hai 1 se 2 lakh ka order value hai sir. Fir ek duplex paper ka Raipur se 50 ton ka requirement aaya hua hai sir iska ek ka, theek hai? Fir ek client aaya 18 minute pehle aaya hai Tamil Nadu ka craft paper roll ka 10 ton ka requirement aaya hua hai sir. Fir craft brown paper 120 GSM ka 5 ton ka requirement aaya hua hai aur ye hai Uttar Pradesh se ji. Fir 130 ton ka requirement aaya hua hai Sona BF craft paper ka 140 GSM ke andar sir. Fir ek Andhra Pradesh se requirement aaya hua hai brown craft paper roll 1000 ton ka aaya hua hai 70 GSM ka. Fir ek 19 ghante pehle Uttar Pradesh se 80 ton ka requirement aaya hua hai.
Customer: Kya hai mujhe bhi wo leads dikhte hain par sir jab communicate karne ki koshish aati hai na to aage se koi response aata nahi hai nahi to sirf kuch reply bhi aata nahi hai sirf ping aata hai to us pe kuch workout nahi hota hai, phone kiya to phone uthate nahi hai ya fir bolte hain aap rate bhejo baad mein koi baat nahi karta hai, phone nahi uthata hai. Humne aisa initially maine samples bhi bheje logon ko.
Hanji.
Customer: Logon ko samples bhi bheje, rate bhi bahut logon ko diye hue hain. To mujhe mera aisa complete overview hai ki is pe kaam matlab banne wala nahi hai hum fir bhi saal bhar koshish karte rahenge kuch hua to theek hai nahi to agle saal se nahi lenge membership, simple si baat hai baki kuch nahi.
Executive: Ji product line.
Customer: Mujhe wo call pe un pe dissatisfied kya maine ye kiya. Unko ek to kuch benefit to ho nahi raha hai uske wo upar wapas se bol rahe ki aap fir se matlab aapki kaise aap bol rahe ho ki fir se upgrade karwa lo 20-25 hazar ke liye. Sharm aani chahiye bolne ke liye.
Executive: Sochna to chahiye pehle customer ka mindset kya hai.
Customer: Sahi baat hai bilkul theek baat hai. Aur maine jab unhone bola ki kyun nahi karna hai, main bola mere koi particular reason abhi unko reason kya du isliye maine sirf bola ki mera no mind hai abhi bas unhone call kaat diya.
Executive: Nahi main aapka feedback unko mail kar deta hu sir ki client ko upselling na ki jaye. Sir servicing ke hi baat chit ki jaye aur unko return investment jab tak nahi milega tab tak unko upgradation ke liye mat boliye. Maine unko last time bhi kya kiya hai do teen do teen chhodo saal bhar mein ek bhi mujhe customer jisme actually main usko 4-5 lakh ka maal bechu na to bhi main bolunga it is a win for me. Even though it will not cover my IndiaMART fee still it is a win for me.
Customer: Correct correct.
Executive: Ye aap kyunki isse pehle bhi teen saal se IndiaMART mere matlab bahut try kiya unhone par mujhe nahi karna tha is saal socho chalo hum kar lete hain dekhte hain kya hota hai leads dikh rahe hain ye dekhte hain par abhi leads dekh ke jo leads aate hain na majorly jo region aata hai na humne actually maine pan India ke liye ye kiya hua hai. Pune Pune ki jo leads aate hain wo actually hum baat karte hain ye hamare jaan pehchan wale hote hain par jo Uttar Pradesh ya Bihar ki jo leads aate hain na most of the leads it looks like it is a bogus lead it is not going to work out. It is just for rate inquiry purpose.
Executive: Ji ji main samajh gaya aapki baat ko.
Customer: Ye wo sir rate lene ke liye ya fir baat chit karne ke liye le rahe hain wo matlab business point of view ke liye nahi main samajh gaya aapki baat ko. Genuine reason bhi samajh mein aata hai ki aap kyun phone karte ho kya rehta hai genuine to hume bhi pata hai ki kya problems ho sakte hain itna long distance mein trading karne ke liye to samajh mein aa jata hai ki wo kya kis baat ke liye kar rahe ho. To fir kya hota hai aadmi ka interest lose ho jata hai par still jab tak hai abhi char mahina hua hai abhi aath mahina bacha hai main bhi aath mahine mujhe jaise jaise time milega main koshish karte rahunga dedicatedly koshish karte rahunga ek bhi lead convert hua to main agle saal aapka membership fir se lunga nahi hua to I would not go for your membership. Ji ji bilkul theek hai. Sir jo abhi aap bas ek kaam kijiye jo bhi maine abhi aapko bulk quantity ki leads batayi hai maine theek hai kyunki budget jo hai 100% consume ho nahi rahi hai to aap sari ki sari budget ko na ek baar pick kar lo aur mein baat chit start kijiye ek baar might be ek bhi click hogi na to achcha khasa order value hai sir unka theek hai to aapki industry bhi badi hai full fledged manufacturing hai to log convincing honge aapko ye wholesaler nahi ho aap sir theek hai to aap manufacturing price pe bhi aap rate de sakte ho sir aap hume theek hai to aap jo bhi leads maine aapko bataya ki ek baar jo bhi 5 ton wala amount likha hota hai 1 lakh se upar ka us pe click karoge na to retail ki leads hat jayengi sirf 1 lakh rupees aur uske above ki leads aapko dikhai dengi aapke portal pe aapko sir. Jo amount aata hai na jo green colour hota hai wo clickable hota hai wo filter hai sir hamara theek hai to aap us pe click kar denge na to jo retail ki aa rahi hai na chhoti chhoti aa rahi hai 20 hazar 25 hazar ki 10 hazar ki wali wo show nahi karengi aapka time kharab nahi hoga waha pe sir.
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: To fir sirf bulk ki lead dikhai dengi sir aapko jaise maine filter lagaya us pe to sirf bulk ki lead dikhai di mujhe tabhi main aapko bata paya sari cheeze sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki koi bhi haan aap kijiye sir. Aap aap account manager hai ya kya hai matlab?
Executive: Sir main manager hu sir yaha pe.
Customer: Okay to matlab aap general manager ho ya particular vertical mein dekhte ho aap aisa kuch?
Executive: Sir vertical mein hi dekhta hu main sir sara.
Customer: Okay okay. Agar koi bhi aapko problem rehta hai sir aap mere number pe aap call kar lijiyega koi bhi service se related koi bhi problem aata hai aapko kisi prakar ki training chahiye aapko to mere ko aap contact kijiye main aapko video meeting pe laake bhi aapko sari cheeze educate kar dunga guide kar dunga main aapko sir.
Executive: Okay aapka kya naam sir?
Executive: Sir Vijay Aggarwal hai mera.
Customer: Vijay Aggarwal theek hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai.
Executive: Right sir. Baki filter wala jo option bataya na wo kafi useful option hai sir wo wala amount bhi aap dalenge to aapko filter out karna nahi padega sir aapko.
Customer: Chalega chalega.
Executive: To aapka time kafi save ho jayega isme ek aur option hai agar aapko kisi location pe lagana hai aapko ki jaise aapke Nagpur se aayi agar aap Nagpur pe click karoge to Nagpur ki lead dikhai dengi sir aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai to wo option bhi hai. Agar aap right hand side pe dekhenge waha pe bhi aapke paas option mil jayega above 1 lakh rupees ka GST wala agar aap click karenge to GST wali leads aapke paas aayegi buyer ki. To waha pe multiple option de rakhe hain hum logo ne sir order value ke bhi.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: To waha se bhi aap easily go through kar sakte hain aur ab agar abhi aap dekhenge 18 minute 58 minute 16 theek hai ye leads abhi bhi available hai aapke portal ke upar aur sir main dekh raha hu ki kuch leads na aapne 10 din purani bhi consume kari hai to usko avoid kijiye sir aap. Jo 10 din pehle leads aayi thi aapke portal pe might bhi ho sakta hai ki uski kisi na kisi aur se baat chit ho gayi uski maturity ho gayi hogi already puri sir to isliye wo ho sakta hai ki aapko entertain na kare theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To jo bhi latest lead aati hai aap us pe zyada focus kijiye sir aap theek hai baki koi bhi problem aata hai mujhe call kijiye sir.
Customer: Definitely okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai koi aur issue sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi baki kuch nahi thank you.
Executive: Okay sir thank you so much sir apna time dene ke liye valuable sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and conversion rate.

- Leads received are not relevant to wholeselling.

- Expresses frustration with upselling attempts.

- Leads from certain regions seem bogus.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the filter option for bulk leads.

- Executive offered video meeting for training.

- Executive assured feedback will be shared.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, upselling, lead quality, filters, membership
